definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

sentences.english: So, Oregon's Pinot Noir is as good as Burgundy's.
sentences.chinese: 所以俄勒冈的皮诺奴瓦和法国勃艮第的一样好。

sentences.english: This article will show you 7 best-known village appellations of Burgundy.
sentences.chinese: 本文将和您一起探索7个勃艮第最著名的产酒村。

sentences.english: Dijon, located in the center of France, is the capital of Bourgogne district.
sentences.chinese: 第戎，位于法国的中心，是勃艮第大区的首府。

sentences.english: A red or white wine originally produced in the region of east-south France.
sentences.chinese: 原产于法国勃艮第的红葡萄酒或白葡萄酒。

sentences.english: She told about the custom of the four wines, which existed before the Revolution in Champagne and Bourgogne.
sentences.chinese: 她叙述香槟和勃艮第人献四道酒的风俗。

sentences.english: This encouraged Burgundians to spread fertilisers to increase production.
sentences.chinese: 这促使勃艮第人不断的施肥以获得更高产量。

sentences.english: A dry white table wine, originally from Burgundy, France.
sentences.chinese: 最初产于法国勃艮第的一种干白葡萄酒，餐用。

sentences.english: In the tradition of a true Burgundian-style Chardonnay, there's an understated power that runs from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 拥有传统的勃艮第霞多丽的风格，口感饱满丰腴。

sentences.english: My lord of Burgundy, what say you to the lady?
sentences.chinese: 勃艮第公爵，您对于这位公主意下如何？

sentences.english: Silver Medal, Concours Des Grands Vins De France, Macon 2011
sentences.chinese: 2011年法国勃艮第马孔“特级葡萄酒竞赛“银奖。

sentences.english: This NAKA wine bag is suitable for Champagne, Burgundy, Bordeaux and Ice wine bottles.
sentences.chinese: 它可用于香槟，勃艮第酒，波尔多酒和冰葡萄酒瓶。

sentences.english: An intense burgundy-red wine with hints of violet.
sentences.chinese: 强烈的勃艮第红葡萄酒色泽出透出紫罗兰色。

definition: Cognac/brandy 白蘭地|白兰地[bai2 lan2 di4] from the Cognac region of southwest France
